lemma coprime_multiplicity:
  assumes "prime (p::nat)" and "m > 0"
  shows "coprime p (m div (p ^ multiplicity p m))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m)
proof (rule ccontr)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m) \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "\<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m)"

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m) \<Longrightarrow> False
with \<open>prime p\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  prime p
  \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m)
have "\<exists>q. prime q \<and> q dvd p \<and> q dvd m div p ^ multiplicity p m"

proof (prove)
using this:
  prime p
  \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>q.
       prime q \<and> q dvd p \<and> q dvd m div p ^ multiplicity p m
by (metis dvd_refl prime_imp_coprime)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>q. prime q \<and> q dvd p \<and> q dvd m div p ^ multiplicity p m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> coprime p (m div p ^ multiplicity p m) \<Longrightarrow> False
with \<open>prime p\<close>

proof (chain)

have "\<exists>q. q = p \<and> q dvd m div p ^ multiplicity p m"

proof (prove)

proof (state)
